options: The scrum team consists of a Product Owner, a Development Team and a Scrum Master.
Testing team is part of the development team.
Scrum team’s don’t have a project manager.
questions.title: Which of the following statements is/are correct in Scrum?

options: Individuals and interactions over processes and tools

options: The development team is responsible for estimating of backlog items.
Product owner is responsible for establishing the product vision.
Once an item is placed in the product backlog, it is never re-ordered.
Each team member can create product backlog items, but Product owner has overall responsibility to manage it.
questions.title: Which of the followings is incorrect in Scrum?

options: Daily Scrum -> Sprint Planning -> Sprint Review -> Sprint Retro
Sprint Retro -> Sprint Planning -> Daily Scrum -> Sprint Review
Sprint Planning -> Daily Scrum  -> Sprint Retro ->  Sprint Review
Sprint Planning -> Daily Scrum -> Sprint Review -> Sprint Retro
questions.title: Pick the standard order of meetings in a Sprint.
Who among the following is the servant-leader of the scrum team?

answers.7: Once an item is placed in the product backlog, it is never re-ordered.
answers.9: Sprint Planning -> Daily Scrum -> Sprint Review -> Sprint Retro

title: How much you know about Scrum?
